mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNO, p.id, p.team_name,p.player_name,p.posi, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createdAT FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.team_name = t.team_name

SELECT r.id FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNO, p.id, p.team_name,p.player_name,p.posi, TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createdAT FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN team t ON p.team_name = t.team_name) r WHERE ROWNO=#{rowno}
SELECT player_name FROM player WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE player SET team_name=#{teamName}, player_name=#{playerName}, posi=#{posi} WHERE id=#{id}
